ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Race to 60 (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Maybe I ve got the wrong person, but weren t you the one who (with a friend) created characters called Banker and Teller a while back?   If that was you
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Kevin L. Crawford [mailto:Lyrnia@...]

> Lol, who cares, either way he didn't really earn 60. He
> "cheated" to get
> it. Not cheated as in broke any rules but definitely cheated
> the system to
> get ahead of it. I refuse to congratulate, hold in awe, or
> respect someone
> that finds pleasure in cheating the system.

Maybe I've got the wrong person, but weren't you the one who (with a friend)
created characters called Banker and Teller a while back? If that was you
than consider this an official ribbing, a busing of your @$$, a pi$$ take,
and an attempt at levity. (Anything but a flame.)

> Glad he's 60.

Me too, because where can he go from there but Asheron's Call?

> Not saying
> this is a BAD
> thing, just that it isn't my style and that I don't respect
> someone for how
> fast they can hit 60 ;)

Heh. I dinged 11 last night. For giggles I hit /played and found out my
bard's birthday was May 5th. That's almost a level a month! Woohoo! And
it only took me 6 days of playing time to do it. I think I deserve a
cookie.

Peace
Evulia, needlessly sarcastic bard of 11 songs, Tunare
